title: "We don't want to kill top viktor"-Meddler
body:
Hahaha

for some reasons I love the bias

Tank ekko
Tank fizz
they were the pinacle of anti-fun BECAUSE IT IS NOT FUN TO FIGHT SOMETHING TANKY THAT DEALS A LOT FO DAMAGE HELLO?

but for some reason, you're only going to nerf top viktor damage a bit instead of killing it
why not?
I'm sure a lot of people like to fight a character that is x2 more tanky than them with infinity shield while dealing as much damage than glass canon swain and runs at jhin's movement speed

christ

replies.body: Viktor is meant to be a battle mage, which means they want him to feel good buying bruiser items. Fizz and Ekko are not, and as ADC eat dog food said, have an abundance of mobility and invulnerability tools and are meant to be burst assassins, not bruiser-y sustained damage dealers. He should be more compared to Swain or Vlad, both of which have sustain in place of Viktor's shields.

Those champ had mobility and invulnerability frames
Viktor doesn't

If Riot were to nerf tanky champs who deal damage they would gut every bruiser/diver/juggernaut

Viktor has range and a spamable shield + speed boost 
Those champs dont

I mean, Ekko tank was even harder to kill than toplane Viktor right now imo.

And it was bullshit that doesn't change that Viktor toplane should be removed aswell.
If I remember A lot of the problems stemmed from the OP Iceborn Gauntlets at the time.

Yea

he just has 13% max mana+26% ap shield every 2.2 seconds, AOE slow/stun
and 30% movement speed boost

hmm, AND RANGE

Yes, that seems about Viktor's kit.

Now, you can damage Viktor without him blinking or going invulnerable while doing the damage so you can fight back and Riot is specifically nerfing the amount of damage he does when he chooses a tanky build (like they did for Fizz and Ekko) so what exactly is the problem here?

I like having Viktor top, I like anything that adds diversity to this stale game 

But it is very ironic when they did a 180 on their bot lane diversity when mages started being a viable option bot but now that they go top its somehow fine.

It's almost like pseduo juggarnauts with range and or gapclose are op
:thonking:
Obvious difference: they are assassins and riot hates assassins lul
Dont dare you to say this on this ~~christian~~ mage boards.
